channel.title: Google Chrome
channel.description:
What are your thoughts on it?
Do you support it?
Do you find troubles with upload forms?
Do you know of any other bugs with it.
*Moderators please move this if it's in the wrong section.

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Cald Panda, post:10, topic:232893”]My laptop has been dropped so many times and it’s pretty much a virus nest so it’s slow. Plus vista just ram f**ks it.[/quote]Mine’s new (Although I’ve dropped it already >.>), but Vista has no problems with a dual core processor and 4GB of ram xD

Read full topic

My laptop has been dropped so many times and it’s pretty much a virus nest so it’s slow. Plus vista just ram f**ks it.

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Cald Panda, post:8, topic:232893”]What do you think the advantages do you think FireFox has over it. After using it for a few weeks I feel like FF appears slower. The program itself and the page rendering.[/quote]I don’t see any problems. If it is slower, it doesn’t really matter to me because it does it fast enough xD

Read full topic

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Cald_Panda Cald Panda
item.description:
@Cald_Panda wrote:

What do you think the advantages do you think FireFox has over it. After using it for a few weeks I feel like FF appears slower. The program itself and the page rendering.

Read full topic

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

The rendering engine is Webkit, so if you support Safari, you won’t have any problems. As far as I know the V8 JavaScript VM doesn’t do weird shit like the IE* and Safari 2 JavaScript interpreters do, so that shouldn’t be too much of a problem either.

Read full topic

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Cald_Panda Cald Panda
item.description:
@Cald_Panda wrote:

Instead of showing a box for file upload inputs it shows a button. This is quite annoying. In some cases it fails to upload files. Try viewing Pwnd’s Upload Host in Chrome to see what I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Cald Panda, post:4, topic:232893”]I’m using it because of the concept. As they say the other browsers where built of engines that where made to suit the internet standards a long time ago. The fact that Google is an overly large company also influences my decision.[/quote]The concept is nice, yes, but it’s still in Beta. I’m also not used to it’s interface.

Read full topic

I’m using it because of the concept. As they say the other browsers where built of engines that where made to suit the internet standards a long time ago. The fact that Google is an overly large company also influences my decision.

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

I chose not to use it yet since Firefox better suits my needs, and because I have 4 GB of ram :]

Read full topic

item.title: Google Chrome
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

There are tons of bugs in it. I’m just going to let it develop then use it when it’s a bit decent.

Read full topic
